item.description: NodePort部署 # wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/dashboard/v2.2.0/aio/deploy/recommended.yaml vim recommended.yaml kind: Service apiVersion: v1 metadata: labels: k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard name: kubernetes-dashboard namespace: kubernetes-dashboard spec: type: NodePort //添加类型为NodePort ports: - port: 443 targetPort: 8443 nodePort: 31010 //映射到宿主机的端口为31010 selector: k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard //执行yaml文件 $ kubectl apply -f recommended.yaml //查看Pod是否运行 $ kubectl get pod -n kubernetes-dashboard //确保该yaml文件提供的pod都正常运行 $ kubectl get svc -n kubernetes-dashboard 访问 # 创建dashboard的管理用户
